project.name: J-C190A-ELAS-10-ST01-DT03-DF06-CF17-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source, and creates a string array based on the value. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is greater than 500, the resultant value 'wraps around', and becomes negative. This results in an exception being thrown, due to the invalid array size.

iopair.name: J-C190A-ELAS-10-ST01-DT03-DF06-CF17-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Add data Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: OUTPUT AND (STATE-EXISTS AND STATE-HAS-CONTENT) AND (GLOBAL-EXISTS AND GLOBAL-HAS-CONTENT) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

if [[ -a good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-4 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
